notes:
#  Recommended Round 1 Loadout:
- Power:  [Revolving Ruin](item_244760fb-c91f-4a03-a45b-848745835b51) 
- Items:
•  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418)  – gives you chase potential and lets you track low-HP targets for cleanup
•  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  – starts your life steal engine early, especially with Wraith Form.
This combo gives you mobility, target tracking, and early sustain, which is perfect for Reaper’s close-range brawling.

# Alternate Option:
If you want to lean into raw DPS instead of life steal:
- Swap  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  for  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) 
→ You’ll stack  [Revolving Ruin](item_244760fb-c91f-4a03-a45b-848745835b51)  faster and get more shots off per second, but you’ll lose early healing.

For Round 2, let’s lean into that **“unkillable vampire”** **Reaper** vibe by mixing **lifesteal** with just enough **cooldown reduction** to keep your Wraith and Shadow Step cycling. You’ve already got  [Revolving Ruin](item_244760fb-c91f-4a03-a45b-848745835b51)  and two Greens from Round 1 (like  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  and  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) ), so here’s how to evolve:

# Option 1: Lifesteal-Heavy (Pure Sustain)
## Buy:
•  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  (Blue Weapon)
→ +5% Weapon Power, +10% Weapon Lifesteal
→ Why: Every shotgun blast heals you—pairs beautifully with Revolving Ruin’s attack speed stacking.
## Sell:
•  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418)  (if you want to keep  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  for ability lifesteal synergy)

# Option 2: Lifesteal + Cooldown Hybrid
## Buy:
•  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  (Blue Weapon)
→ +10% Weapon Power, +5% Cooldown Reduction
→ Why: Boosts your DPS and brings Wraith/Helix back faster—more uptime = more healing.

## Sell:
•  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  (if you want to shift toward weapon-based sustain)

 # Step-by-Step
- **Sell** one Round 1 Green (whichever feels less core to your playstyle).
- **Buy** either  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  or  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  depending on whether you want more healing or more uptime.
- **Keep** the other Green for now—either  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  (ability lifesteal) or  [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418)  (mobility + target tracking).
- **Test** how long you can stay in fights without needing to Wraith out—this will guide your Round 3 item path.

# 🦇 Round 3 – Take Flight
## **Buy:**
-  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)  (Blue Ability):
• +10% Ability Power, +10% Ability Lifesteal
-  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59)  (Blue Survival):
• +25 HP; While in Wraith Form, gain flight & +20% Move Speed
Why:
-  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)  stack with  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  for supreme lifesteal on all Wraith Forms.
-  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59)  turns Wraith Form into a vampire’s glide—evasive, stylish, and constantly healing with Wraith Renewal later on.

# 💀 What You’ve Become So Far
- You have **lifesteal from every angle**: weapon, ability, Wraith Form
- You can **kite or chase** using Wraith Wings
- You stack **attack speed** with  [Revolving Ruin](item_244760fb-c91f-4a03-a45b-848745835b51) , amplifying your healing loop
- You're prepped to pop off with  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5)  next: the moment you score a kill, every cooldown resets

# 🧛‍♂️ Round 4 – The Reset Begins


## 🔹 Item:  [Wreath of Ruin](item_8581ce4b-3997-4639-91ea-7d7eec3029e1) (Epic Ability)
• +20% Ability Power
• +25% Death Blossom radius
• +20% Move Speed during Death Blossom
**Why**:
- Even if you’re not ulting yet, this boost
- When you do ult, it becomes a whirling AoE lifesteal storm—bigger radius, faster movement, harder to escape.
- Pairs beautifully with  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5)  resets and  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59)  mobility.

✅ Step-by-Step
- **Sell** any remaining Green item (if you still have Heartbeat Sensor)
- Buy Wreath of Ruin
- Keep:
- Technoleech (weapon lifesteal)
- Shady Spectacles (ability lifesteal)
- Energized Bracers (AP + ability lifesteal)
- Wretched Wings (Wraith flight + speed)

## 🧬 What You’ve Become
- You now heal from every source: **shotguns, Wraith, and soon Death Blossom.**
- You can **reset cooldowns** on every kill, **chaining Wraith → kill → Wraith again.**
- You’re mobile, evasive, and impossible to pin down—a true vampire predator.

# 🧨 Round 5 – The Super-Mag Awakens
## 🔹 Power:  [Shrouded Shrapnel](item_b7373fd2-69d3-453b-89f3-b5ce87dc0c3a) 
Using Wraith Form increases the number of pellets in your next magazine by 25% and its spread by 50%.
## Why:
• Wraith now primes your next mag for lifesteal-heavy burst
• More pellets = more healing per shot with  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) 
• Wider spread = easier hits = more resets with  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5) 
• Turns Wraith into your damage buff instead of just an escape

# 🔹 Item:  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  (Epic Weapon)
• +20% Weapon Power
• +10% Critical Damage
• Critical hits reveal the target for 3 seconds
## Why:
• Heavier burst = bigger lifesteal chunks post-Wraith
• Crit hits punish squishies and fuel your next pick
• Target reveal helps you finish low-HP enemies mid-Wraith-loop
• Complements  [Shrouded Shrapnel](item_b7373fd2-69d3-453b-89f3-b5ce87dc0c3a) ’s massive mag boost for clean 1vX wipes

# ✅ Step-by-Step
- Select Power 3:  [Shrouded Shrapnel](item_b7373fd2-69d3-453b-89f3-b5ce87dc0c3a) 
- Sell any underperforming Blue (if you’re still holding one)
- Buy  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  for crit synergy and kill tracking
- Keep:
•  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8)  (weapon lifesteal)
•  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)  (ability lifesteal)
•  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e)  (AP + ability lifesteal)
•  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59)  (Wraith mobility)
•  [Wreath of Ruin](item_8581ce4b-3997-4639-91ea-7d7eec3029e1)  (AP + Blossom upgrades)

## 🧬 What You’ve Become
• Every Wraith exit now loads a **lifestealing burst-mag** primed to erase targets
• Criticals reveal prey and feed  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5)  resets
• Death Blossom becomes a cleanup tool—not an opener
• You're not just a vampire—you’re a **cursed shotgun loaded with shadow magic**

## 🦇 Round 6 – The Blood Crown

This is where your Vampire Reaper build becomes fully awakened. You’ve got lifesteal from every angle, cooldown resets, and Wraith-powered burst. Now we lock in legendary sustain and Death Blossom dominance.

# 🔹 Item 1:  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643)  (Legendary Hybrid)
• +10% Weapon Power
• +10% Ability Power
• +15% Weapon & Ability Lifesteal
• At full HP, lifesteal converts into 100 Overhealth

## Why:
• This is your lifesteal amplifier—every shotgun blast, Helix, and Wraith tick heals you harder
• Once full HP, you start generating Overhealth, making you tankier the longer you fight
• Stacks with  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) ,  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e), and  [Wreath of Ruin](item_8581ce4b-3997-4639-91ea-7d7eec3029e1)  for absurd sustain

# 🔹 Item 2:  [Devastation](item_085f627a-5f84-4df6-8d9e-cda842a2c239)  (Legendary Ability)
• +15% Ability Lifesteal
• Each Death Blossom elimination grants +25 HP (up to +100 HP)

## Why:
• Turns your ult into a healing nuke—every kill during Blossom restores HP
• Pairs with  [Wreath of Ruin](item_8581ce4b-3997-4639-91ea-7d7eec3029e1) (radius + speed) and  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5)  (resets) for full-team wipes
• Makes Blossom a safe engage, not a risky all-in

# ✅ Step-by-Step
- **Sell:**
•   [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) (outscaled by Flux + Bracers)
•  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  (if you want full sustain over crit burst)
-**Buy:**
•  [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) 
•  [Devastation](item_085f627a-5f84-4df6-8d9e-cda842a2c239) 
- **Keep:**
•  [Technoleech](item_cb7fd8bf-bdcc-439a-ad35-372f24a027a8) 
•  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e) 
•  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59) 
•  [Wreath of Ruin](item_8581ce4b-3997-4639-91ea-7d7eec3029e1) 

# 🧬 What You’ve Become
• You now heal from every action—and when full, you gain bonus HP
• Death Blossom is a lifesteal bomb that resets your cooldowns and stacks max HP
• You’re a flying, Overhealth-stacking, cooldown-resetting predator
• You don’t just survive fights—you grow stronger with every elimination

# 🧛‍♂️ Round 7 – The Immortal Ascension

This is it—the final piece of your Vampire Reaper build. You’ve got lifesteal from every angle, cooldown resets, Overhealth stacking, and a Death Blossom that heals you mid-spin. Now we lock in the last Power that makes you unkillable even when retreating.

## 🔹 Power:  [Wraith Renewal](item_bcfde4e9-a18e-4169-bbfc-6439b7a2615a) 
While in Wraith Form, restore 10% of your max HP every second. This doubles to 20% when below 50% HP.

**Why:**
• Wraith becomes your panic button and healing surge
• Combined with  [Wretched Wings](item_ddc65697-b80d-4559-b93c-57349855ee59) , you can fly while regenerating
• If you’re low, you heal 40% HP in 2 seconds—then re-engage with  [Shrouded Shrapnel](item_b7373fd2-69d3-453b-89f3-b5ce87dc0c3a)’s super-mag
• It’s the final layer of sustain that makes you impossible to finish off

# ✅ Final Power Loadout
-  [Revolving Ruin](item_244760fb-c91f-4a03-a45b-848745835b51)  – Attack Speed stacking = more lifesteal
-  [Spirited to Slay](item_e11c7adb-70b7-4816-8e31-2c94c600bfd5)  – Elim resets = infinite Wraith/Helix loops
-  [Shrouded Shrapnel](item_b7373fd2-69d3-453b-89f3-b5ce87dc0c3a)  – Wraith primes your next mag for burst
-  [Wraith Renewal](item_bcfde4e9-a18e-4169-bbfc-6439b7a2615a)  – Wraith heals you massively, especially when low

# 🧬 What You’ve Become
• You heal from every action—shotguns, Wraith, and Blossom
• You reset cooldowns on every kill, chaining Wraith → burst → Wraith
• You fly while healing, then drop with a super-mag and Overhealth
• Death Blossom is a lifesteal bomb that grants HP and resets your kit
• You’re not just hard to kill—you’re designed to never die

🛒 Core Inventory
| Slot | Item | Trait | 
| 1 | Technoleech | Weapon Lifesteal + Power boost | 
| 2 | Energized Bracers | Ability Lifesteal + Power | 
| 3 | Wretched Wings | Wraith → Flight + Speed | 
| 4 | Wreath of Ruin | Death Blossom = bigger + faster | 
| 5 | Phantasmic Flux | Lifesteal amplifier → Overhealth | 
| 6 | Devastation | Blossom kills restore up to +100 HP | 



🧬 Signature Combo Loop
- Wraith in → heals you via Wraith Renewal
- Exit Wraith → gain super-mag via Shrouded Shrapnel
- Fire boosted shotguns → lifesteal through Technoleech + Flux
- Pick off enemy → Spirited to Slay resets every cooldown
- Repeat, or trigger Death Blossom to heal + delete a cluster

You are now a swirling, shadowed nightmare that feeds, heals, and never stops moving. Want a streamer overlay version of this build card next? I’m locked and loaded. 🦇🔥
